data.comment: Today's referee, Bastein Dechepy, has blown to start the match.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Lens.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 7, Bastein Dechepy awards Brestois a goal kick.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Corner awarded to Lens.
In the minute 9, Lens have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Lens to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In Lens, Simon Banza of Lens is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 11, Goal! Arnaud Kalimuendo heads Lens into a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Florian Sotoca to set up the goal.
In the minute 12, Bastein Dechepy signals a Brestois throw-in in Lens's half.
Free kick Brestois.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Brestois.
Brestois's Ronael Pierre-Gabriel has been booked in Lens.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lens.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 17, Bastein Dechepy signals a throw-in for Brestois, close to Lens's area.
Brestois's Franck Honorat misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
In the minute 19, Brestois pushes forward through Romain Faivre, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Brestois's Franck Honorat gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lens defender.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Brestois.
In Lens, Jean-Kevin Duverne (Brestois) misses the target with a header.
Lens have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 24, Important block from the Brestois defence as Arnaud Kalimuendo fires in a strike for Lens.
Lens push forward at Stade Bollaert-Delelis and Seko Fofana gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Brestois defence.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Hiang`a Mbock (Brestois) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Lens defenders.
Throw-in Brestois.
In the minute 32, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Lens.
Jean-Kevin Duverne for Brestois has been booked by Bastein Dechepy and receives a first yellow card.
Florian Sotoca nets and Lens extend their lead to 2-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 35, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 37, Irvin Cardona (Brestois) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Bastein Dechepy awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Throw-in Brestois.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Brestois are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 44, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Brestois.
Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Brestois are pushing forward but Irvin Cardona's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
In the minute 50, Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bastein Dechepy awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
In the minute 53, Lens have a goal kick.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brestois's half?
Free kick Brestois.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lens's Arnaud Kalimuendo gets in a shot on goal at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Lens Brestois drive forward through Steve Mounie. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 58, Lens to take a throw-in in Brestois territory.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Brestois.
In the minute 60, Brestois have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 61, Arnaud Kalimuendo of Lens gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Bastein Dechepy signals a Lens throw-in in Brestois's half.
In the minute 62, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bastein Dechepy awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Ludovic Baal is replacing Hiang`a Mbock for the away team.
The away team have replaced Franck Honorat with Gaetan Charbonnier. This is the second substitution made today by Oliver Dall'Oglio.
Throw-in for Lens close to the penalty box.
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a second substitution, with Massadio Haidara replacing Ismael Boura.
In the minute 65, Cheick Oumar Doucoure is on a sub for Yannick Cahuzac for Lens.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 68, Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
Free kick for Lens in the half of Brestois.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 71, Lens push upfield but Bastein Dechepy quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
Bastein Dechepy awards the away team a throw-in.
Lens's Simon Banza breaks free at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
In the minute 73, Gael Kakuta is replacing Arnaud Kalimuendo for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 74, Brestois have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
Brestois have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 75, Oliver Dall'Oglio is making the team's third substitution at Stade Bollaert-Delelis with Cristian Battocchio replacing Romain Faivre.
Romain Philippoteaux is replacing Steve Mounie for Brestois at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Throw-in Brestois.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Lens.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Bastein Dechepy.
In the minute 80, Brestois are coming forward and Romain Philippoteaux gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Bastein Dechepy awards Lens a goal kick.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Ronael Pierre-Gabriel with Brendan Chardonnet. This is the fifth substitution made today by Oliver Dall'Oglio.
Bastein Dechepy waits before resuming play because Jean-Louis Leca for Lens is still down.
Jean-Louis Leca (Lens) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Wilker Farinez.
In the minute 86, The home team replace Simon Banza with Ignatius Kpene Ganago.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Bastein Dechepy signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago for Lens gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Lens.
Lens's Ignatius Kpene Ganago gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Brestois have a goal kick.
Lens drives forward and Gael Kakuta gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Brestois have been awarded a penalty...
Lens apply pressure at Stade Bollaert-Delelis and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Gael Kakuta but the strike hits the bar!
Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
That's full-time at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. The final score is 2-1.
Goal! Brestois now trail just 2-1 thanks to a Gaetan Charbonnier spot-kick.
